message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I'm willing to offer it to you for $11500. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $10000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and compromise on the price. What do you think?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns, but I'm willing to meet you halfway as well. I'm willing to lower the price to $10800. This is a fair compromise considering the product's value to me is $12000.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9800. Can you meet me at this price?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll lower the price to $10200. This is as low as I can go, considering the product's value to me is $12000.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9500. Can you meet me at this price?
